src:
Golkar Gelar Munas 4-6 Desember, Melchias Markus Mekeng Ketua Panitia
05 Nov 2019, 22:26 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Partai Golkar telah menyepakati jadwal gelaran musyawarah nasional (munas). Munas Golkar akan digelar pada awal Desember 2019 ini.
"Munasnya akan diselenggarakan tanggal 4, 5, 6 Desember bertempat di Jakarta," kata Ketua Umum Golkar Airlangga Hartarto usai rapat pleno di kantor DPP Golkar, Jalan Anggrek Neli, Slipi, Jakarta Barat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Golkar sepakat menunjuk Melchias Markus Mekeng sebagai ketua panitia munas. Adapun ketua panitia pelaksana munasnya yakni Adies Kadir.
"Munas akan dipimpin oleh ketua panitia penyelenggaranya adalah Melchias Markus Mekeng. Kemudian steering commitee-nya adalah Ibnu Munzir. Kemudian panitia pelaksananya adalah Adies Kadir," sebut Airlangga.
Namun, sebelum munas, ada sejumlah kegiatan yang akan diselenggarakan, yakni perayaan HUT ke-55 Golkar dan rapat pimpinan nasional (rapimnas). Rapimnas Golkar akan digelar pada 14-15 November ini di Jakarta.
"Jadi agenda politik ini dimulai dengan acara besok yaitu HUT Partai Golkar tanggal 6 (November) pukul 19.30 WIB bertempat di Hotel Sultan (Jakarta). Ini dalam rangka ultah 55 tahun Partai Golkar. Yang kedua rapimnas Partai Golkar akan diselenggarakan tanggal 14-15 November," ungkap Airlangga.
Ketua panitia rapimnas Golkar yakni Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmitha, Ibnu Munzir sebagai steering comittee, organizing comitte dijabat Heru Dewanto. Informasi yang diterima, munas Golkar akan digelar di Jakarta Convention Center (JCC).

(zak/jbr)
text:
Golkar Holds National Conference 4-6 December, Melchias Markus Mekeng Chair of the Committee
05 Nov 2019, 22:26 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - The Golkar Party has agreed on a schedule for the national deliberations (munas) event. The Golkar National Conference will be held in early December 2019.
"The National Conference will be held on 4, 5, 6 December in Jakarta," said Golkar Chairperson Airlangga Hartarto after a plenary meeting at the Golkar DPP office, Jalan Anggrek Neli, Slipi, West Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Golkar agreed to appoint Melchias Markus Mekeng as chair of the National Committee. The head of the National Committee was Adies Kadir.
"The National Conference will be chaired by the chairman of the organizing committee, Melchias Markus Mekeng. Then the steering committee will be Ibn Munzir. Then the executive committee will be Adies Kadir," said Airlangga.
However, before the General Assembly, there were a number of activities to be held, namely the celebration of the 55th anniversary of Golkar and the national leadership meeting (rapimnas). Golkar Rapimnas will be held on November 14-15 in Jakarta.
"So this political agenda starts with tomorrow's event, which is the Golkar Party's 6th anniversary (November) at 19.30 WIB at the Sultan Hotel (Jakarta). This is in the context of the 55th birthday of the Golkar Party. , "said Airlangga.
The head of the Golkar rapimnas committee, Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmitha, Ibnu Munzir as the steering committee, the organizing committee is Heru Dewanto. Information received, Golkar General Assembly will be held at the Jakarta Convention Center (JCC).

(zak / jbr)
